metadata.title: Mexicoâ€™s Maya Train derails in the Yucatan Peninsula, but no injuries reported

left: A Maya Train derailed in the Yucatan Peninsula while slowly pulling into a station in Izamal, according to the train line's statement.
No injuries were reported following the incident during the train's journey from Cancun to Merida.
Passengers were transported the remaining distance by bus after the derailment.
The accident is currently under investigation, but normal operations continued between other stations as noted in the statement.
